name: Solar Space Whale
description:
Direct coloured crystals to the solar panels.

Fill a solar panel with all three colours to gain a point.

If you direct a crystal to a panel that already has that colour, it'll explode.

Try to remember what colours you put where!

Made in 8 hours for the June Berlin MiniJam.

Richard Sööt (@Vertexial_Games)  - Art

Chris McMath (@chrismcmath)  - Programming

Julian Pieper - Programming
